title: Bug on the launch screen....

embed.description: Album with topic of No Topic uploaded by supernova4562. Free champion rotation

body: I almost thought that every champion was on free rotation.

replies.body:
That is truly a beautiful sight.  I shall call it MissingRo!  

http://imgur.com/a/5DJNc

That's certainly a visual issue!  Check the [Free Champion Rotation](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/free-rotation/new-free-champion-rotation-aurelion-sol-braum-nocturne-and-more) page for the correct details.

I don't think it is purely visual because I was able to interact with it. Through extreme lag, I could click on it and scroll through every champion in the game. [Seen here.](http://imgur.com/gallery/DS3wt)
